report.name: refpca5

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
select 'page', to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000') CODSG, substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5) CODDP, pack_rep_refpca4.f_trityp(lb.typproj) TRITYPE, DECODE (pack_rep_refpca4.f_trityp(lb.typproj), 'PLAN' , 'PLAN INFORMATIQUE', 'T5', 'STRUCTURE', 'T6', 'EXPLOITAION', 'T7', 'ABSENCES', 'T8', 'ACTIVITES TECHNIQUES', 'ERREUR') LIBTYPE, lb.icpi ICPI, lb.pid PID, lb.typproj PTYPE, substr(pri.ilibel,1,25) LIBPROJET, nvl(conso.cusag, 0) + nvl(conso_1.cusag,0) + nvl(conso_2.xcusag ,0) CUMULJH, nvl(conso.cusag, 0) CONSOJH, nvl(floor(budg.reestime), 0) REESTJH, nvl(floor(budg.bpmontme), 0) PROPOJH, nvl(budg.bnmont, 0) NOTIFJH, nvl(floor(budg.reserve), 0) RESERJH, nvl(budg.anmont, 0) ARBITJH, nvl(floor(budg1.bpmontme), 0) PROPOJHN1 from ligne_bip lb , proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , consomme conso , consomme conso_1, consomme conso_2 where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso_2.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso_1.pid(+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) -- Au moins une des donnees n°7 a 15, ou b.xcusag0 ou b.xcusagM1 est different de zero and ( (nvl(conso.cusag, 0) + nvl(conso_1.cusag,0) + nvl(conso_2.xcusag,0) + nvl(floor(budg.reestime), 0) + nvl(floor(budg.bpmontme), 0) + nvl(budg.bnmont, 0)+ nvl(floor(budg.reserve), 0) + nvl(budg.anmont, 0) + nvl(floor(budg1.bpmontme), 0) ) != 0 ) &p_where order by to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'), pack_rep_refpca4.f_trityp(lb.typproj), lb.icpi
-- and pb.bpannee(+) = 2000 -- and bn.bnannee(+) = 2000 -- and ban.anannee(+) = 2000 -- and pb1.bpannee(+) = 2000+1
dataSource.comment: Cette edition a deux laoyouts. Leurs donnees sont casiment le meme. La seconde edition est une synthese de la premiere. Dans la premiere, on n'a pas les totaux pour le departement pole.

dataDescriptor.expression: nvl ( conso.cusag , 0 ) + nvl ( conso_1.cusag , 0 ) + nvl ( conso_2.xcusag , 0 )

dataSource.name: Q_type_proj
dataSource.select: select 'pagea', max(substr(to_char(lb.codsg,'FM0000000'),1,5)) CODDPa, max(lb.typproj) PTYPEa, sum(nvl(conso.cusag, 0)) CONSOJHa, sum(nvl(floor(budg.reestime), 0)) REESTJHa, sum(nvl(floor(budg.bpmontme), 0) ) PROPOJHa, sum(nvl(budg.bnmont, 0)) NOTIFJHa, sum(nvl(floor(budg.reserve), 0)) RESERJHa, sum(nvl(budg.anmont, 0) ) ARBITJHa, sum(nvl(floor(budg1.bpmontme), 0) ) PROPOJHN1a, sum(nvl(floor(budg2.bpmontme), 0) ) PROPOJHN2a from ligne_bip lb , proj_info pri , budget budg , budget budg1 , budget budg2 , consomme conso where lb.icpi = pri.icpi and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg2.pid (+) -- Au moins une des donnees n°7 a 15, ou b.xcusag0 ou b.xcusagM1 est different de zero and ( (nvl(conso.cusag, 0) + nvl(floor(budg.reestime), 0) + nvl(floor(budg.bpmontme), 0) + nvl(budg.bnmont, 0)+ nvl(floor(budg.reserve), 0) + nvl(budg.anmont, 0) + nvl(floor(budg1.bpmontme), 0) +nvl(floor(budg2.bpmontme), 0) ) != 0 ) &p_where1 group by lb.typproj order by lb.typproj

textSegment.string: ETAT : Suivi par Client projet synth.
ETAT : Suivi par Client projet synth.

function.name: rtrimetoile
